data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jałoszyński, Paweł (2014): The smallest Cyrtoscydmini of Australia: revision of Microscydmus Saulcy & Croissandeau and Penicillidmus gen. n. (Coleoptera, Staphylinidae, Scydmaeninae). Zootaxa 3774 (1): 1-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3774.1.1
